description:
Your Next Family Home!
This three bedroom family home plus study offers two generous sized living areas. The kitchen which has an abundance of bench space and cupboards and also has an electric cooktop, underbench oven and dishwasher. It overlooks the separate meals and family room and opens onto a large outdoor entertaining area. The master bedroom is located to the front of the home with walk in robe and ensuite with the remaining two bedrooms located to the rear, both with built in robes. They share the family bathroom with bath, shower and vanity. The study opens onto the second living space and could be utilised as a fourth bedroom. The home has ducted gas heating and evaporative air conditioning. Externally there is a garden shed and double garage which is open at the back making it ideal for those who love to entertain as it makes a fantastic extension to the outdoor entertaining area. For the investor, this property was previously being rented at $390 per week. This home offers low maintenance gardens in a sought after area of town and must be inspected to appreciate what is on offer.
We have in preparing this information used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements contained. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained herein.

Just move on in
This three bedroom unit offers a fantastic open plan layout which is not only spacious but also opens onto the outdoor entertaining area. The laminated kitchen has electric stove and an abundance of cupboard and bench space. All three bedrooms have built in robes and easily accommodate queen size beds. The combined laundry/bathroom is unique and again has heaps of storage, inset trough, basin and separate shower compartment. The single garage has roller door to the front and is open to the rear. Externally there is a good sized yard for a unit, garden shed and tranquil water feature adjacent the outdoor entertaining area. For the investors this would make an ideal unit to add to any portfolio with potentially a 6.5% gross return on investment.

Neat as a pin
This solid three bedroom home has formal lounge with split system, separate dining and kitchen with electric stove. All three bedrooms have ceiling fans. Bathroom has shower over bath, vanity and separate toilet. Externally there is a single carport, fernery and garden sheds. For the investors, this property could be potentially leased at $235 per week giving an approximate 8.2% gross return on investment.

The Aspects! The Location! The Design!
Elevated excellence and a must to inspect. Positioned on a generous elevated 875 square metre block in at the top of Tilton Court, this stunning family home residence offers luxury living inside and out.
The large open plan living area has a feature stone fireplace, well appointed kitchen with butler's pantry and ample cupboard space, and sliding stacker doors opening to the beautiful alfresco living area, making this combined area perfect for large family gatherings. The alfresco area also features a stone open fireplace, ceiling fan and zip track blinds - suitable for year round enjoyment. Spacious second living area, four generous bedrooms and fully equipped study/office. Appealing bathroom, ensuite with large shower recess, ducted zoned reverse cycle air conditioning, zoned in-floor heating, 9 foot ceilings and tinted windows.
Sparkling in-ground pool and an outdoor toilet & shower. The large double garage has twin auto-doors and direct house access, plus a third garage ideal for golf buggies, toys, etc. Lovely landscaped, easy-care surrounds. Garden shed, veggie patch and 7.4 kilowatt solar electricity system. Prime river-end location, only a short walk from the Murray River and walking tracks. Must inspect to appreciate all that this property has to offer.
A must to inspect!

What A Lifestyle! What A Location!
This stunning three acre property is ideally located on the town outskirts and offers in town rural living. The top quality five bedroom craftsman built family home is sure to impress. Features large open living area, superbly appointed kitchen, fully insulated theatre room with screen and projector and generous bedrooms including large master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite.
Quality appointments throughout, ducted reverse cycle heating and cooling and 5 KW solar power system. Fabulous outdoor living area with feature open fire place, built in bar and second deck overlooking the in ground heated pool.
Excellent shedding incorporating 21m x 9m colorbond shed with attached storage container, six vehicle carport and side office makes the property ideal for the tradesman, or truck driver. Gravelled driveway, established lawns and a paddock for the horse.
A very unique property, priced well below replacement cost, that is sure to impress.

Vendor Relocating
This home is within walking distance to the towns CBD and has been renovated with Style.
It has 3 Bedrooms, an updated kitchen and bathroom, a wood fire that creates ambience, ducted heating, ceiling fans and evaporative cooling that creates comfort. The living areas are of generous size with separate lounge. From the rustic timber floors upon entry to the large enclosed back yard with undercover entertainment area this home is set on a large block in a quiet street, ideal for the perfect family or can offer a great investment returns.
As an extra bonus the home is partly furnished with a large stainless steel fridge, plasma TV and 3 piece lounge suite
The property provides room for the caravan, boat, trailer and room for the family to grow.
